last_episode_to_air.name: All the Little Bombs
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brady vanquishes her foes, only to find there are traps. Joe makes a romantic declaration, as John is a hero. Savannah's triumph turns to betrayal.

name: Filthy Rich
overview: Three illegitimate children discover they each have a claim to the fortune of one of NZ's wealthiest men, John Truebridge. With so much money on the line, John's legitimate family will do anything to stop these new, unexpected heirs!

episodes.name: Other Natural Children
episodes.overview: The Beck clan learns that in order to secure their inheritance from the late Big Guy, they have to live with his illegitimate son, Wild Bill Westchester.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Family
episodes.overview: After losing her husband, Brady Truebridge is left to deal with his three illegitimate children. But as she sets out to kill with kindness, John Jr sets his sights on a new conquest.

episodes.name: A Little Payback
episodes.overview: The drama continues as John Jnr has a change of tactic and plays nice to win over Joe, but Brady plays dirty, with devastating consequences for Savannah's mum Lorna.

episodes.name: Is Not Thy Wickedness Great
episodes.overview: Savannah is desperate to help her mum, but angers a powerful enemy in the process. Brady suspects treachery and sets a trap for a blackmailer, and John Jnr tempts Joe with secrets and vice.

episodes.name: The Rich Never Share
episodes.overview: Revelations force Brady to rethink her husband’s death and Joe regrets his indecent actions from the night before. But as more details unfold, he could be one step closer to finding his birth mother.

episodes.name: Friends in High Places
episodes.overview: John Jnr is playing a double game and seeks out his notorious mother Vivian. Savannah’s boardroom triumph is quickly undercut and Brady sends Cherry on an indecent mission.

episodes.name: To Justice
episodes.overview: Vader worries for Savannah as she starts to put a deadly plan in motion. Vivian confronts Nancy over the secret of Joe’s past.

episodes.name: An Unholy Alliance
episodes.overview: Vader deflects his feelings for Savannah, as Joe gets shock news about his mother. Kennedy's night out leads her into danger.

episodes.name: Dangerous People
episodes.overview: Joe's life spirals out of control and he takes refuge with John Jnr. Savannah returns to the club to hand over more cash to Karl, but a confrontation has dangerous consequences.

episodes.name: What Better Revenge
episodes.overview: Vader helps Savannah cover her tracks, as Brady gets a message from beyond the grave. Joe realises he's made a deal with the devil.

episodes.name: The Obvious Line of Enquiry
episodes.overview: Brady is in over her head as the evidence stacks up against her. Meanwhile, Joe takes drastic action to break free from John Jnr.

episodes.name: All Things Decent
episodes.overview: John Jnr sets his sights on a new target and Savannah pieces together the clues to discover who framed Brady.

episodes.name: In the Money
episodes.overview: Brady discovers John Snr may have more hidden secrets and Grace reveals her true feelings to a shocked Kennedy. Joe makes a play for power that lands him in bed with a new temptress.

episodes.name: An Advantageous Match
episodes.overview: Joe continues his love affair while John Jnr comforts a distraught Arianna. Evidence emerges about Karls death that will have devastating consequences...

episodes.name: Scores to Settle
episodes.overview: Savannah heads to the police station to confess; Joe realises that he and Annabelle might have a stalker; and a blast from Vader's past threatens to out his true identity.

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.overview: Brady tries to pull Savannah back from the dark side as she continues her path of self-destruction. John Jnr pulls out all the stops to seduce Arianna.

episodes.name: Warrior Stock
episodes.overview: Savannah continues on her path of self-destruction as Brady enlists the help of Fisher to save her. Joe receives a bombshell from Toni; and John Jnr may finally have his wicked way with Arianna.

episodes.name: Bully, Blackmail, Bribe
episodes.overview: Joe and John Jnr face off over Ariana, as Joe gets unexpected news. Kennedy's entrapment plot comes disastrously unstuck.

episodes.name: Judas in Your Midst
episodes.overview: Joe tries to win back Arianna as John Jnr makes an extreme proposal. Brady and John Jnr form a new alliance but treachery in the boardroom has shocking consequences.

episodes.name: Everything I've Done
episodes.overview: Brady uncovers information that sends shockwaves throughout the family. The truth about John Truebridge Snr's death is revealed, and one life is left hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: Talk of the Town
episodes.overview: New Season. Vader vows to avenge Savannah, as Brady hits the comeback trail. John Jnr uses blackmail to his advantage, as Joe's loyalties are tested.

episodes.name: Big Fat Fibs
episodes.overview: Vengeance comes at a price for Vader. Birthday gifts lead to temptation for Kennedy. John Jnr swallows more than his pride.

episodes.name: Compliant and Grateful
episodes.overview: Kennedy takes to the road in search of her father. John makes a sacrifice in a noble cause. Brady uses all her ammunition to keep the cuckoos in line.

episodes.name: Fortune Favours the Brave
episodes.overview: Savannah conspires with an old foe to undermine Brady. Newly successful John Jnr tries to resist old temptations. Meanwhile, Brady gets an unlikely admirer.

episodes.name: Good in a Crisis
episodes.overview: Joe's baby news threatens to land him in hot water. Savannah knows who her champions are, but can she be with the one she loves?

episodes.name: What the Lady Wants
episodes.overview: Brady has big demands - but finds a bigger enemy in Malia. A name and shame campaign pays off for Kennedy. Ariana is keeping a secret, as Savannah ices a nemesis.

episodes.name: Local Connection
episodes.overview: Fisher's plans force Brady back to family - to confront her past and present. And Joe's family connections bring a world of trouble.

episodes.name: Champion of the People
episodes.overview: In the wake of tragedy, there's a fight for justice. Vader fights for the maiden, and Savannah vows to kill a killer.

episodes.name: One Rule for the Rich
episodes.overview: Joe pays a price to keep his son. Brady hits Fisher where it hurts, and John receives miraculous bounty.

episodes.name: Fight Dirty
episodes.overview: Brady clashes with Ariki as Kennedy reveals all online. Vader finds a jealous ex has plans for destruction. Ariana and Annabelle go head to head - and the gloves are off.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: Ariana and Joe have unfinished business, but shock news leads to heartbreak. Brady launches an assault on Fisher, which leads to killer consequences.

episodes.name: A Lesson in Loyalty
episodes.overview: Kennedy finds that her nearest might not be her dearest. Joe finds his mother has big plans. John works the angles - only to end up as a target.

episodes.name: All the Little Bombs
episodes.overview: Brady vanquishes her foes, only to find there are traps. Joe makes a romantic declaration, as John is a hero. Savannah's triumph turns to betrayal.
